title: (2008) Veritas - Calling the Storm
description:
Veritas has been together in one form or another since early 04. we play black metal with non traditional song structure for the most part. i build songs with waves of sounds and layers of guitars.
this album is fully acoustic and the recordings vary from more than 4 years old to being as recent as this past november.

you may like if you like early Ulver, Weakling, Wolves in the Throne Room, 3rd and the mortal, Agalloch  


Veritas - Calling the Storm (2008)

1. Gathering of Winds 9:58
2. Tranquil thoughts 1:55
3. Calling the Storm 8:22
4. Veritas part 1 9:03
5. Veritas part 2 11:06

total time 40:24
74mb




this is my own band
check it out and leave comments on what you think of it.
